resources.string: Hello! 👋 We are Bitself, a team of 6 high school students from Cluj, who got together within the Academy Discover your passion in I.T. 😄 Because we are interested in the future of our community, we decided to develop an application that has a positive impact on the environment and facilitates the rapid finding of a charging station for electric cars. 🚗🔌⚡ Sharing is caring, therefore we will encourage electric car owners to help each other by sharing their own Wallboxes. 🤝

string-array.name: description
string-array.item: a cool description\navailable at any time
A description of this charger will be available soon. just wait.
